description.en: Topics covered by the course include secure system modelling, security management standards, domain model for security, risk management, risk assessment, management of protected assets, security risks, and security countermeasures (e.g., access control, penetration testing, identity management, etc.), security level assessment, management of security at different types of systems (e.g., business process-aware systems, intelligent infrastructure, blockchain-based systems, identity management systems, risk-aware forensic systems, etc.).
description.et: Kursusel käsitletavad teemad hõlmavad turvalist süsteemi modelleerimist, turbehaldusstandardeid, turbe domeenimudelit, riskijuhtimist, riskide hindamist, kaitstud varade haldamist, turvariske ja turvalisuse vastumeetmeid (nt juurdepääsukontroll, läbistustestimine, identiteedihaldus jne. ), turbetaseme hindamine, turbe haldamist erinevat tüüpi süsteemides (nt äriprotsessiteadlikud süsteemid, intelligentne infrastruktuur, plokiahelapõhised süsteemid, identiteedihaldussüsteemid, riskiteadlikud digikriminalistika valmissüsteemid jne).

objectives.en: This course will provide students with an overview of the principles for cyber security management. The participants will learn what security risk management is and how to ensure confidentiality, integrity and availability of secure assets. The course will also analyse how to manage security requirements and security countermeasures (e.g., access control, identity management, penetration testing, etc.). The course also includes the overview modelling languages for security management, legal and regulatory basis. The learners will study the security management principles through different hands-on exercises and use cases. During the practical seminars, the learners will apply the security management principles for different systems (e.g., business process-aware systems, intelligent infrastructure, blockchain-based systems, identity management systems, risk-aware forensic-ready systems, etc.).
objectives.et: Kursus annab õpilastele ülevaate küberturvalisuse juhtimise põhimõtetest. Osalejad õpivad turvariskide juhtimist ning kuidas tagada varade konfidentsiaalsuse, tervikluse ja käideldavuse. Kursusel analüüsitakse ka turvanõuete haldamist ja vastumeetmeid (nt juurdepääsukontroll, identiteedihaldus, läbistustestimine jne). Kursusel antakse ülevaade ka turbehalduse modelleerimiskeeltest ning õiguslikest ja regulatiivsetest alustest. Õppijad uurivad turvahalduse põhimõtteid erinevate praktiliste harjutuste ja kasutusjuhtude kaudu. Praktilistel seminaridel rakendavad õppijad erinevate süsteemide turvahalduse põhimõtteid (nt äriprotsessiteadlikud süsteemid, intelligentne infrastruktuur, plokiahelapõhised süsteemid, identiteedihaldussüsteemid, riskiteadlikud digikriminalistika valmissüsteemid jne).

grade_evaluation.en:
There will be several assessment items:

-	Practical assignments (9 points) – assessed as submissions of laboratory and homework assignments

-	Test (21 points) – assessed as multiple-choice tests

-	Project (25 points) – assessed as reports where a solution to problems will be provided

-	Final written assessment (45 points) – assessed as written or computer-based examination results.

debt_elimination.et:
A deferred exam will be offered to students:
- who are unable to attend the first exam, or

- who did not collected the required assignment points in the due time but were able to do so before the deferred exam (before the newly pre-set submission deadline).
